item.title: Any One Interested In An Android Project
item.description:
Well as I have been getting deeper into the Android library, I have begun to
notice a few things.
- I am repeating a lot of code for common tasks(db, barcode, gps,... )
- Common place for instruction is not found (I use google, blogs,
stackoverflow,...)
- Books talk technical not practical of if so not usefully("this is how
item.author: matt...@gmail.com (Matthew Wojtowicz)

item.title: COMP 366/488 needs more students
item.description:
Dear All:
I am writing this e-mail on behalf of Dr. Honig, who is teaching the
Microcomputer Design course next term. Given the significant number of
students who were interested in hardware and hacking in general in this
course, I would like to encourage you to sign up for this course. There are
presently only 8 students enrolled, and in general a course needs 10
item.author: g...@cs.luc.edu (George Thiruvathukal)

item.title: C Question
